4. djWasabi.git¶

Git related functions.

djWasabi.git.cloneRepository(name=None, repositoryUrl=None, debug=False)[source]¶

Clone the provided git repository into specific directory.

djWasabi.git.commitFile(file=None, message=None, debug=False)[source]¶

Commit a file when it is changed.

Parameters

  • file (str) – The name of the file we want to commit.

  • message (str) – The commit message we want to use.

  • debug (Bool) – If we want debug logging enabled.

Return type

bool

Returns

When committed (True), or no commit has been made (False)

djWasabi.git.getCheckTag(tag=None)[source]¶

Check if we have already a tag with same name.

Parameters

tag (str) – The name of the tag.

Return type

bool

Returns

If the tag exist (True) or not (False)

djWasabi.git.getLatestTag()[source]¶

Get the latest tag created.

Return type

str

Returns

The latest created tag.

djWasabi.git.getMainBranch()[source]¶

Get the current main of master branch.

Return type

str

Returns

The ‘main’ or ‘master’ branch

djWasabi.git.readRepository(repo=None, debug=False)[source]¶

Get the remote url and return the username and repository.

Return type

str

Returns

The username/repository of the current directory.
